adDetails: PACKING! PACKING! PACKING! We are the packing ACE TEAM! No matter how much chaos, disorder and mess. Or, if you're surrounded by extremely fragile things that require extreme care, packing technology, we can handle it. We arrive with a MOBILE WORK SHOP! On our truck is every box and tool needed to pack, consolidate and protect your items, belongings and fine furniture. Your move will go safe and sound by using our packing professionals first! It's all in the preparation. Get Greg's packing on the job to get it done right! And yes. . . if you need moving services near or far we can advise on that too!
